body_html: Thanks for the patch, but I don't think we're going to merge it. The problem is that the OS X containers are hardly ever available, and this slows down the contbuild so much, that I don't really think it's worth it. Linux contbuilds normally finish in ~4mins (if no C changes are made), but the build for this PR has been already running for 13 mins and the OS X jobs haven't even started.
